name: The Artist Series featuring Michael Bedford
description:
We are pleased to announce the opening showcase of Toronto-based artist Michael Bedford.

Michael Bedford is a fine art photographer and painter. Trained as a biologist, Michael’s work explores aspects of both the human psyche and the natural world. The inaugural exhibition, titled "Light and Lack Thereof", is a powerful collection of Bedford’s work which delves deep into the duality of light and darkness. 

The Artist Series is a new innovative to support local talent and enrich the cultural landscape of the city by offering rotating exhibits & hosting artist parties.
